FuncDef: The reset radius-attribute packet-count command resets the count of attributes in RADIUS packets.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before you count the attributes in RADIUS packets again, run the reset radius-attribute packet-count command to clear counts of attributes in RADIUS packets.
After clearing counts of attributes using the reset radius-attribute packet-count command, you can run the display radius-attribute packet-count command to view accurate counts of attributes in RADIUS packets.
